name: Queen Mama Chanter
text: Activate: Main: Rest this stage, you may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life area to your hand: Place up to 1 of your Characters with a cost of 3 on top of the owner's Life area face-up.

effect.text: Rest this stage, you may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life area to your hand: Place up to 1 of your Characters with a cost of 3 on top of the owner's Life area face-up.
